_description: Prayer and conjuration against thieves — four couplets plus two line Latin conjuration

BodLauMis685.First Lines:
ȝyf ony thevis com ny my good a way to fetthe holy gost be
                    than be forn all thevys for to let…
BodLauMis685.Last Lines:
…They tak the theuys & bynd hem fast & do them
                    nosoreas dyd Saynt Bartylmew þe fend wit her of Berd so
                    hor
